wir sind flop sehr dankbar, dass er sein außerordentlich schönes plätzchen mit gästen teilt. sehr gerne kommen wir wieder, am liebsten im sommer, um die tollen zusätze wie fahrrad, kanu und tisch am steg zu genießen zu können. aber auch das schlechte wetter war nur halb so schlimm, weil wir uns an der mollig warmen heizung und einem heißen tee schnell wieder wohlfühlen konnten.

if you are coming to amsterdam then you have to stay on flips boat. all the amenities of an apartment or hotel. hot shower, comfy bed, good heat, and an amazing breakfast included. very very clean and flip is very thoughtful in the things he leaves in the space for you to use. two free bikes as well, hard to beat everything that is included. location is easy to get anywhere in a hurry as well, 5 min bike ride to central or anne frank house.

flips home was a great place to stay to get the full amsterdam experience. the boat was so much fun and within walking distance of most things we wanted to see. breakfast was great too! would love to stay again.

i must say that this was a very unique experience.  the room is nice, the bed is absolutely comfortable, the breakfast was delicious and flip was a very friendly and nice host.  i was a bit worried about staying in a boathouse during winter but it was nice and warm.  i  absolutely recommend this!

great location not far from central station. ceiling on boat might be a bit low if your really tall. bikes made everything available within minutes. very quite and private, safe area for walking day or night.

a very extraordinary place in the middle of amsterdam. very cosy and nicely done house boat with love in the details. a perfect place to spend a few day's with your beloved person in the middle of this pulsing city.

wow. is all. staying on ms. luctor was the perfect way to spend a mini break in amsterdam. there is so much we could say about it but you really need to discover it for yourself. our highlights were eating delicious breakfast whilst sat in the cabin overlooking the canal, the use of the bikes to explore the city, and being able to come back to somewhere warm and cosy after a very cold day. thank you flip - i hope we get to come back one day!
we had an amazing time in amsterdam and flip’s boat was lovely, the breakfast that was left every morning was very generous and delicious. would recommend to everyone.
staying on the boat was such a novelty. the breakfast which was delivered to us every morning was outstanding. lovely quiet location but very convenient to the city by foot !
a great place if you want something a little different. warm, cozy, and a full breakfast. would highly recommend.

une perle! la péniche de flip est l’endroit parfait pour visiter la belle amsterdam. par sa localisation, ses petits « plus » (vélos, guides à disposition...) et l’endroit en soit est juste parfait pour vivre la vie à la hollandaise. nous espérons pouvoir y revenir!!!  merci flip!
wonderful stay and a great experience. book it!
a fantastic and slightly quirky place to stay in amsterdam.
flip’s houseboat was amazing ! great location, charming and flip was a wonderful host providing us with information and a scrumptious breakfast! what a delightful stay !

just like the reviews we read, the place was a great place to spend our days in amsterdam! very novel, very romantic, and flip our host was extremely hospitable, friendly and helpful. the breakfast is tasty and fresh (freshly squeezed orange juice!) and can fill you up till the afternoon! we enjoyed ourselves very much!! highly recommended!! only one tiny detail- very tall people should consider that the ceilings are limited, they may have to bend over a bit, and bathroom a bit narrow. but otherwise, fantastic place!

endroit atypique avec beaucoup de charme idéalement situé dans un quartier calme mais proche de la gare et du centre ville. flip est un hote attentionné qui vous apporte le petit déjeuner tous les matins. la hauteur sous plafond est basse et à prendre en considération pour les personnes de plus 1.80m.

we absolutely loved our stay on the boat. fantastic view while having the excellent breakfast, everything clean and super comfy. short distance to the central station and a bus station, short walk into the city centre. flip was such a gentle person. everything has been perfect!

flip was de perfecte host en ons verblijf was heerlijk! de boot is prachtig, de locatie is erg goed gelegen met een super leuk uitzicht tijdens het ontbijt. tijdens onze eerste volledige dag hebben we gebruik gemaakt van de fietsen. enorm handig om amsterdam mee te verkennen! we zullen zeker overwegen om nog een keertje terug te keren naar deze b&b bij ons volgend bezoekje aan amsterdam! flip, erg hartelijk bedankt!
great space, very clean and comfortable! great breakfast included and bikes being included was an added plus.

the views of the canals from the barge are wonderful. the best part is having the amazing breakfast in the wheel house and enjoying the view each day. flip's place is a must for a true taste of amsterdam.

super tolle unterkunft, klein aber fein. morgens aufstehen und dein frühstück ist schon auf dem tisch herrlich. das bett super gemütlich. die lage mit den fahrrädern erreicht man in 10min. die innenstadt.
einfach nur perfekt!

wonderful location a comfortable walk north of train station. great atmosphere on the water. was quiet, even friday and saturday nights. flip provided delicious breakfast each morning; more than we could possibly eat. the space was great. bed was so comfortable. great shower and all exceptionally clean. stay on flip's boat for a unique amsterdam stay.

emplacement parfait, 10mn a pied de la gare centrale; le bateau est situé dans un endroit tres calme; rien a redire sur le logement , tout est parfait comme sur les photos. le petit dej est impeccable et apporté vers 8h30 dans la cabine, libre a vous de le prendre plus tard. nous sommes arrivés a 08h00 et en accord avec flip,  nous avons  pu disposer de suite du logement;  les velos a dispos sont un plus, nous sommes à 5 minutes du centre et parfait pour se deplacer dans tout la ville.   nous ne regrettons pas notre choix, c etait parfait

flip's place was amazing!!! if you are looking at any other apartment or house boat in amsterdam just stop and book this one now!  the boat's location is outside of the city center which is great for peace & quiet.  his boat itself is super cute and perfect for a couple!  just a small note: i'm 5'4 and my boyfriend is 6'.  i  could easily stand on every level, but my boyfriend had to slouch a little on the first floor where the steering wheel is and on the bottom where the bed is.  that was no issue though since we didn't spend a lot of time in there anyway and he could stand in the middle floor if he needed to :)  three concerns you may have that i had:  1) the shower is great/like a normal shower, including water pressure  2) the toilet is like a normal one as well ( a little loud if you flush at night and your partner is a light sleeper) 3) even though you're on a boat, you can't tell. aka you shouldn't get "boat legs" or feel nauseous  aside from the location and the boat itself, my other absolute favorite part was the thoughtful  breakfast he provided every morning.  everything was delicious and it was so amazing and convenient to have it just ready for us every morning so we could get our day going asap!  he's very considerate of your privacy and makes sure the time he drops off the breakfast works for you.   he also provided two bikes which was incredible.  we literally took them everywhere.  the only slightly negative thing i can say is the girl's bike/smaller bike was a little squeaky/old, but it worked just fine!   there was also a super close bus stop, but we never used it aside from when we first arrived.    another side note: if you get back late/want to stay in, ubereats delivers there as well :)   i hope i didn't leave anything out!  i would 100% stay there again for a future visit, and hope that i can!   seriously! book this now!

wonderful place, great setting and fantastic hospitality. quiet at night and very comfortable stay with a lovely breakfast in the morning. being able to bike around amsterdam on the bikes supplied by flip definitely made our weekend!

flip's place was exactly as described and amazing! we loved riding the bikes around amsterdam and enjoyed waking up to a lovely breakfast basket from flip. would highly recommend staying here and is also in a great location :)

our adventure started with a no fuss check in, a casual bike ride (on flips free use bikes) to the local store for cheese, crackers, wine and tapenade to settle in for our first evening on a gorgeous private little jetty overlooking the canals to enjoy our local feast. we were joined by flip during the evening. he ensured we were checked in and comfortable and answered all our questions about the local attractions with warmth a smile befitting a generous host. nothing was too much trouble and flip even put the canoe in for us on the morning of our departure for a last minute paddle. the location is ideal. close enough to the city to walk but far enough away to be peaceful. can't recommend enough.
great breakfast, use of bikes and beautiful stay.

our stay on flips canal boat was amazing. the location is so close to the center of amsterdam. we had use of bikes and a canoe which was an awesome way to see amsterdam. flip was helpful and friendly.  breakfast was amazing.  thanks for the memories.

wow!  our stay was the best part of our stay in europe. quiet and beautiful with an incredible host.  it was a 10 minute walk from the train station, and very easy to find.   the space was unbelievable.  there was more room  than we had anticipated in the shower, bedroom and lounging area.  breakfast was waiting for us each morning with the option of eating inside or out on the jetty.  what a great way to start our days of touring the city.   s we highly recommend flip's place.  10/10. thank you again flip!
fantastic experience. wonderful breakfast. unique and special accommodation.
stay here! it is an amazing place!  so close but just far enough away to relax! the bikes are so very helpful on getting around town. flip is a thoughtful and caring host!  thank you
we had an amazing time. the houseboat was charming and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay, especially the fresh breakfast waiting for us in the kitchen every morning!
flip was very  helpful and  considerate  of us and our allergies.  he was great to  chat too as well . will  definitely  stay again  at this  romantic  house boat

this boat is a gem. it is on a quiet canal only 15 minute walk to train station. flip is a great host.  he brought a wonderful breakfast basket every morning with fresh breads, cereals, yogurt, and fresh squeezed orange juice. check in was easy and the boat and bed very comfortable. flip even printed our shuttle voucher to our next connection. the boat had a nice shower and coffee and tea maker. the dock was great for sitting on by the picnic table and it really feels as if you are living here. we even met his neighbour who is an eel fisherman. we would highly recommend the ms luctor!

flip's houseboat was an amazing way to stay in amsterdam. the breakfast each morning was incredible. the location was great (close to centraal station). the space was very comfortable and clean. i would recommend staying at flip's place.
best   -airboat+breakfast- you'll ever stay at!

this is a fun way to get to know amsterdam.  an authentic houseboat, great location, really great breakfast every morning, and flip (host) who is there to help with questions and special considerations making sure you have a nice visit.
great location, lovely boat with a great breakfast. close enough to walk to central station and there is a team stop across the dock.
highly recommend this place. it’s a 12min walk to center town. quiet and beautiful

we loved our stay on the ms. luctor.  residential area, beautiful views, quiet, cozy and clean.  flip was a wonderful host  and the information (and breakfast) were so appreciated and wonderful.  this is true amsterdam and devoid of all tourists. perfection.
amazing houseboat in a quiet location that is perfect for exploring amsterdam! the attention to detail, bikes  and breakfast made this even better than we had imagined!
excellent place to stay in amsterdam. the boat is nice and clean! the breakfast really good. we really like it :)
an absolutely fantastic place! beautiful boat and surroundings. great location! would definitely recommend this! outstanding!
super cool place and host!  if i ever going to amsterdam again, i will definitely stay at flips houseboat again.  i recommend it for anyone!

flip's houseboat is phenomenal. we absolutely loved our stay here and the only complaint was that we didn't have a longer stay booked in amsterdam to enjoy it longer. we were a short walk to the center of town but far enough away that it was quiet and peaceful. the breakfast provided was top-notch. flip is extremely kind and when we come back to amsterdam we will definitely make it a point to stay here again.

great houseboat - lovely quiet location but not far from the action. flip was very responsive and helpful. great having the bikes on hand - loved using those. we would definitely recommend this place to our friends.
we loved our stay on the boat, so cosy and such a great space, the breakfast was a special touch. 20 minutes walk max to most places we wanted to go. would definitely stay again
a quality establishment - perfect in every way - the breakfast was something else!

flip's houseboat was a great place to stay in amsterdam. it was a fun experience staying on a houseboat, and everything about staying on flip's was ideal. flip was a kind host, the breakfast was great, the space was welcoming, and the location was nice. i highly recommend staying here!
prima plek! het gebruik kunnen maken van fietsen is ontzettend fijn! we hebben genoten en komen hopelijk nog een keer terug!
we had a superb stay. the houseboat was quirky and charming. flip was a wonderful host, who provided lots of great local recommendations. we want to come back soon!
tout est en accord avec l'annonce. le logement est propre, bien situé, agréable. le petit déjeuner est parfait et copieux. flip est très réactif. je ne peux que recommander.

a unique experience staying on flip’s boat. good location, easy access to the city. flip was a good host, warm and welcoming, nothing too much trouble.   bed was sooo comfy! wonderful breakfast, freshly prepared each morning.

in amsterdam i got live on both a boat and an apartment. if i were to do it again, i would choose the boat. the location is amazing and the boat is really cool. it has everything you need, including a private bathroom with a shower. flip is a really accommodating host and did an awesome job with breakfast. the boat is really close to the main city where everything is happening. if you would like to amplify your amsterdam experience, come stay at flip's place.

agréable séjour dans un lieu sympathique et cosy. quartier calme  avec des restaurants de qualité à proximité. centre-ville rapidement accessible à pied. flip est disponible et son petit-déjeuner est très appréciable !
very nice place near to the center but more quiet !  very very nice home ! and very very nice person ! thank you michele (and patsy ;)) !     gwen
nice apartment with very good connections with the centre or train station by tram. we enjoyed our stay there for sure.thank you michele  iratxe and aritz  july 2010

it was a great idea staying at michele's home! very nice house and close to the city centre! delicious breakfast and very kind telling us great places to visit. if you have the chance to visit amsterdam and need accomodation don't think twice and contact him.

michele was a gracious host.  his place was conveniently located near trams & buses and it was a very easy commute into the central area of amsterdam.  the apartment was very well maintained and impeccably clean. his cat is very sweet too. a great place to stay.

this was a room that got sorted out at the very last min. so a big thanks to michele for helping me out. he is a very polite host. the room was great, very neat and tidy and the rest of his apartment is the same. would recommend highly
michele was a fantastic host. perfect spot near the center but with local flavor. helped us find a local cafe to enjoy a drink and also made breakfast. thanks again!
michele was a great host! very friendly, welcoming and hospitable - and puts on a great coffee in the am! many thanks again my friend.

michele was a great host.  the apartment snd room was very clean.     the apartment is conveniently located with lots of trams and buses nearby, we found it very easy to get around.    we would strongly recommend staying with him.

wonderful apartment. it is easy to get to and it is very clean and michele is a very thoughtful host. he has a beautiful kitchen and the bedroom is great. michele makes everything spotless. my wife and i had an excellent stay. a big thanks to michele. highly recommended. we will stay again when we visit amsterdam, that is 100% for sure.
many thanks to michele as he was a great host! the rooms and his appartment were very clean, tidy and the location was easy to reach from the center..recommended to everyone..

michele hosted 3 of our family members, including an old aunt, who might not have been the easiest guest on earth :). this was my (and their) first airbnb experience, and definitely a promising one!  michele's apartmant was tidy, and as he wasn't at home at the time when the guests arrived, he gave the key to us a bit earlier, and showed everything in the flat.  he emailed me to check if everything was alright, and whatever i mentioned, he quickly adjusted.  they had a great time, and said that they would certainly recomend his place. the only negative fact they mentioned, is that the apartment is somewhat noisy even at night as there's a busy road at front of the house, although ofcourse it's not his fault,  but part of city life :).

michele's place was perfect for our weekend stay in amsterdam.  his apartment is clean, comfortable, and very easily accessible by public transportation (both day and night).  he was very hospitable; he helped us find directions and get oriented in amsterdam, and even laid out breakfast each morning.
michele is a great and helpful person. his apartment is really nice and his breakfast is delicious. i just can recomend his place. thank you michele and patsy!
thank you for the breakfast and the tips michele.  it is a good choice pick this one :) ...

michele's apartment was clean and tidy.  michele was a great host, very generous and helpful.  the location was very accessible and easy to get to the center of town.  i would recommend staying there.
michele was a wonderful host.  the room was clean and lovely he left us a great little breakfast for us in the morning and has a super cute cat!!!   thanks michele!!!

michele was a great host! he made me feel very welcome and would highly recommend him as a host for anyone wanting a good place to stay in amsterdam. the breakfast in the morning was wonderful. thanks michele!

cosy room. good location. helpful host! perfect accomodation, especially for cats lovers =).

michele was an incredible host--very respectful of our space (it felt like we had the apartment to ourselves!) and left a nice breakfast for us every morning. the rooms were very cozy and comfortable and incredibly clean. it was very easy to get into the city center with the trams that stopped basically right outside of his apartment. we would definitely stay with michele again if we go back to amsterdam!!
yes, it was a very nice homely experience with an equally caring host.  we look forward to meet him again.  himanshu & chandrakala joshi,
had a great stay at michele's house.     the place is nice and well equiped. it's not center city but honestly well located as closed from the centre and the major parks by bike.

michele is vern nice and hospitable. his place is centrally located enough so we had no problem walking thru--out the city.     we came planning to cycle in holland, so we brought our hybrid trek cycles. although nearly everyone in amsterdam has at least one bike, they do not leave good cycles on the street. the city also has one of the world's highest theft rate for cycles.  michele rents out two rooms.  as the other room was vacant, he suggested we place our bikes in it.     the two flights of steps up were narrow and extremely steep. my wife would not have been able to get her bike up or down by herself.     the bedrooms are very small, yet have storage for your clothes.

the place was great, nice bed, the kitchen was fully equip, the living room is beautiful. michele is a great host, giving us good info. have a nice cat to accompany, makes the place more lively as michele has to work. worth staying and will definitely come back to stay.

we had a very nice time at michele's house. his house was very clean  and i could not tell enough about the pillows and mattress they were super extra confortables. he was so kind to us he even let us a delicious breakfast every morning  and he has the sweetest cat we have ever met.  we would love to stay with him again. thank you michele!!

my sister and i enjoyed our stay at michele's house. the room is a bit small but exremelly clean.  michelle was a great host and made a delicious coffee on the evening we arrived.   the flat is in a very quiet location and is withing easy reach from the town centre.   the breakfast is small but i believe michele did say that on the website.   i strongly recommend those rooms in amsterdam.  cheers!

michele's place was very nice!  we were there for two nights, and we felt very much at home.  he provided a yummy breakfast each morning, including pastry, coffee, and juice, and we were able to do laundry before we headed to our next destination.  he was also very accommidating to our travel schedule.  he met us during his workday to give us a key and pointed us to the correct bus stop to find our way to his place.  the location is a bit outside of the city centre, but the bus and tram were easy to navigate, and the walk was only about 25 minutes.  we would definitely recommend him as a host!

staying with michele was a warm, friendly and cosy experience. the apartment is really nice and clean, the mood is very friendly, connections to downtown are great (even just walking isn't too bad) and michele is a great host. the room was small, but functional - as expected. i wish we had more time to hang around with michele. it was all in all a great and all positive experience and i would highly recommend it.

we had a wonderful time.  the apartment is lovely and michele has a beautiful companion, patsy, a chocolate siamese! it was great to have comfortable beds and cotton sheets after hostel beds.  and a washing machine to catch up with clean clothes!    we recommend this to anyone visiting amsterdam, but be aware there are 2 flights of narrow steep stairs.  michele was home when we arrived and acted as porter for his 2 (older) guests.  thanks michele.

the apartment is conveniently located near the central area, needing only around 5 tram stops. the place is clean and well maintained, although the stairs up to the apartment is very steep! there is also a kitchen which we were allowed to use. best of all, michele provides breakfast every morning!

the apartment is as described and shown, cozy and welcoming. at times, it felt like we were the only ones around, even though michele was present in his own room. he was very welcoming and patient with our two young kids. the tram stop to dam square is a short walk from his block, and there are a handful of eateries around the corner too. the only slight inconvenience is that the apartment is on the third level up stairs that have small steps, so it can be a slight struggle if you have plenty of heavy luggage, like we did. overall, we enjoyed our stay here, and would return if we are ever in amsterdam again.

nos encanto quedarnos en el piso de michele, el piso muy limpio y comodo, tuvimos nuestro propio espacio que para nosotros es importante, no está centrico pero en 15 minutos ya estás en el centro y me encanto el gato :)...lo recomiendo...

michele welcomed us in a very friendly manner on the night of our arrival. he had organised breakfast for us and he left us his home as he was leaving on holiday himself. so, the whole flat was at our disposal which was enjoyable in a way although we did regret not to have a couple of chats with him about amsterdam way of life or dutch social issues. patsie is a very friendly pet and as a cat lover i loved cuddling  in the evening after one day visit in nearby amsterdam center.( very convenient to reach thanks to public transport or after a 30 mn walk)
lovely place, warm and friendly - and with a lovely cat. we felt very much at home and would stay with michele again. highly recommendable.

michele's apt is conveniently located in the west part of the city center. from his aprtment, it only takes 2 min. walk to tram 14 and 5 min walk to tram 13, both go to the dam square and central station. the apt is very clean and has the facilities you need. michele is a very easy going fellow and he made us feel home. thanks for the breakfast for us each morning. one thing to keep in mind that there is no elevator in the apt. you do need to carry your luggage to the 2nd floor.

really nice place and a very good host! in a part of amsterdam that is close to the center but far enough to get away from tourism. michele was a very kind good host that treated my friends and i very well (and gave us breakfast in the morning! very kind). thank you!!

my husband and i had a wonderful time staying at michele's place!  such a great location as we became familiar with amsterdam.  michele was a great host providing yummy breakfast for us each morning.  would highly recommend!

had an awesome stay with michele! he is accomodating and always available for assistance and the apartment is very cosy. michele was also kind enough to let us use his washing machine and dryer. i would definitely stay here again on my next trip to amsterdam. good job!

we had a great stay at michele's place. easy access to the tram if you want to go downtown or go back to central station, the 12 and 14 trams are right outside, with 13 and a few others a block or two walk away. there is a grocery store about 1 minute away as well. the flat was awesome, really clean and michele was very generous, wish we could have seen him more maybe, but he gave us our space which was nice too.
we had great time. thanks michele!

michele was a great host, and very helpful. his tidy and cozy apartment was conveniently located to anywhere we wanted to go in amsterdam, by tram, bus, or walking. and of course, there's michele's siamese cat, patsy, the queen of her domain, is a delightful addition for cat people.
good location, very convenient. we did not had a chance to meet the host.  he let us stayed as the dates we booked and give us detailed check-in infomation.  we really appreciated.

it was my first time staying with someone via airbnb and i cannot recommend it enough. our host, michele, was very friendly, answered quickly to enquiries, kept everything tidy and clean and served us a small breakfast every morning: in general made us feel welcome. the location itself is easy to reach via public transport. all in all, i can definitely recommend this host. thanks again !

we were very comfortable staying with michele. his apartment is lovely and beautifully decorated and our room was very pleasant. we had two single beds and they were so comfortable. we slept very well. we especially liked patsy the cat! what a sweety. michele was very kind to leave breakfast treats out for us in the morning and we were pleased to have use of the coffee machine as well. overall we were very happy with our stay.

michele is very nice and served up breakfast. it is very quiet and quite the place.

my boyfriend and i stayed with michele for 3 nights and had a brilliant time. michele's place is spotless and is beautifully decorated. the room we had was super cosy and the bed was very comfortable. we enjoyed playing with his very social and beautiful cat!     michele was very helpful with regards to public transport and recommended the best way of getting around. he even printed a map for us. the apartment is literally across the road from the bus station which will take you to the centre of amsterdam in no time. we also found it easy to walk to the centre (about 30 minutes), which we preferred as you get a great feel of amsterdam and you will pass many great pubs and bakeries. overall we had a wonderful time and would definitely recommend to everyone.
nice rooms in a clean, quiet, very nice apartment. only took us about 20 minutes to walk into the center of the city. definitely recommended.

oll was wery good!

great stay thanks michele - a really enjoyable place from which to experience amsterdam. michele was very friendly and accommodating. thanks!

we thoroughly enjoyed our stay here in amsterdam. michele and his siamese cat, patsy, made us feel welcome, but also allowed us our privacy. i would recommend staying here to anyone who can climb 2 flights of stairs. this was a great introduction to my first visit to europe.

nice home, clean and equipped.  michele is nice and friendly.  the cat is adorable.  awesome experience in amsterdam thanks michele.

he is a really good host, preparing breakfast for us.. really have good opinion in food, love chit chat with him. assist us calling the cab. and not to forget his lovely siamese cat, very adorable and welcoming.  about the house, very clean and beautiful as in the picture. near to the tram stop, just walking distance within 1-2min.   the stairs to his house is steep, however he doesnt mind helping us. thanks a lot michele! we really enjoy our stay at your house.

although we didn't have much contact with michele due to our short visit to amsterdam, i'd highly recommend him as a host. his apartment is close to the centre, it takes circa 10 minutes to get to the centre by bike. he is ready to help you, whenever you need him and the breakfast was fine. thanks michele.

michele is wonderful person and his place is very clean, comfortable and wonderful. we enjoyed our stay in his place and enjoyed the neighborliness of quite friendly cat.  thanks for his hospitality.  hovhannes.

michele is an excellent host with the best and most detailed information available from the time you read the listing. it was a lovely and comfortable stay with all the necessary comforts, public transport in close walking distance and a supermarket just around the corner. michele and his co-host, the lovely cat patsy, were both very friendly and welcoming.

michele is very polite and helpful. he made us feel home very quickly and the room was clean and cozy. he was very willing to give us information about traffic and tourist spots. and patsy was a lovely cat!

great place to stay at! michele's apartment is extremely clean and tidy. he even offered us coffee and bread for breakfast.

the stay at michele`s house was very good. it is easy to reach the neighborhood. the room is clean, well oranized. the breakfast , light but excellent to start the day: coffee, milk, orange juice, crackers and jam. patsy is like another guest there!!!
very nice place and close to the city center by bike.

when we first rode the bus to michele's neighborhood, we wondered if we were in the middle of nowhere! however, the public transportation is so very good, it was no issue. we were very comfortable @ michele's room. the bed & pillow were especially comfortable! the room was basic but adequate. if one has mobility issues, the stairs to the 2nd floor are steep - a bit like climbing a ladder. once we got used to it, not a huge deal.
ottima accoglienza, host molto disponibile e sistemazione impeccabile. molto soddisfatto

michele's apartment was very nice and clean. it's also pretty close to the center of the city and main attractions. there's a bus stop just right  in front of the apartment so that was very convenient. i also loved that the room we got had a walk in closet so we had room to store our luggage.  michele was also a very nice host and quick to respond to any issues. his cat,  patsy was adorable as well!
we enjoyed our stay in michele ' s place. everything was very clean and comfortable. super close to public transport which made getting around amsterdam a breeze. patsy was so cute and cuddling! !
host was very kind, and shared his nespresso machine with us! great location and very friendly cat.

che dire, sicuramente l'ottima accoglienza di michele ha subito reso positivo il nostro (seppur breve) soggiorno ad amsterdam. persona cordialissima, gentile e disponibile ci ha subito consigliato su come muoverci. l'ambiente della camera è semplice, ma con tutto quello che serve (i letti comodissimi!!!). c'è a disposizione la cucina per cucinare e al mattino puoi prendere dei succhi, il caffè, the, e fette biscottate per colazione offerti da michele.  la compagnia della sua gatta patsy dona buonumore fin dal primo mattino.. veramente tanto affettuosa!!!  sicuramente consiglio a tutti di pernottare qui sia per il semplice fatto che è ben collegato coi mezzi sia, e soprattutto, per il bell'ambiente e per la gentilezza dell'host che non possono far altro che rendere ancora migliore la vostra vacanza lì.  grazie ancora!!

though we didn't see a whole lot of him, michele was a kind host and easy to communicate with. his apartment is a bit small but it has everything you'll need and is in a great location. just a hop to the tram station and a short ride away from most sites. the apartment is tidy and the amenities work fine. the stairs to the second floor are really steep and narrow so beware if you have lots of heavy luggage! overall it was a great stay and i would stay here again!
it was amazing his cat was so nice and he was so helpful. it truly felt like a home.

superbe chambre vraiment à 5 minutes en tram d'amsterdam. michele est très sympa et très discret! patsy adore les câlins et a su nous tenir compagnie pendant nos petits déjeuners ! merci michele pour cet agréable séjour !

we had a comfortable stay here over christmas. michele is very welcoming and was helpful in guiding us in how to find the listing. the room is conveniently located as there are tram stops a very short walk away direct to the city centre and main attractions, as well as schiphol airport.  the room and toilet were very clean, plus it was nice to be able to keep some of our food in the fridge. his cat is one of the friendliest cats i've met!
appartamento e stanza sono molto accoglienti e puliti. la zona è servitissima dai mezzi ed è facile muoversi per la città.  siamo stati molto bene, grazie michele!  alice e danilo

michele was a wonderful host. a friend and i were at another airbnb that did not work out, and michele took us in with less than a day's notice. his place is cozy, quiet, and clean, and as others say, his cat is very friendly. michele was very accomodating and helpful. the place is in a great location, with only a 15-20 minute tram/bus ride to many points of interest. we were very pleased with our stay!

michele is a great guy, quiet and doesn't bother you at all and he is ready to help you when you need him. beds are little bit small but realllyyy comfortable to sleep in! his cat is cool, you don't see it that much. apartment is clean, we had free coffee and free musli for breakfast. apartment is really near city center and you have tram station just across the street. only stairs in the building are squeeky and really steep and small so it is bit hard to walk on them if you are high haha i loved it there and next time i am going there again! thanks michele! wish you all the best :)

nice to have short stay..breakfast is there, just self service. i love his cat.if u have (hidden by airbnb) map and i amsterdam card, its easily for u to his house and everywhere u want in amsterdam. btw michele is nice host. he's quite busy man. couldnt say thank u at the end of my stay....

bei michele war es wunderbar. er wohnt sehr zentral und sehr gastfreundlich und vor allem sehr unkompliziert. das zimmer ist sauber und die wohnung top! wir hatten sehr grosse privatsphäre und michele erklärte und am anfang alles notwendige. ein besuch in amsterdam ist immer lohnenswert, der aufenthalt bei michele ist dabei ein muss.  gjon/cordelia

my stay in his house was very nice! the house was very clean and tidy and he was a good host as well. the accommodation is very close to the tram stop and also easy to access to central. the cat living there is so pretty!
a cosy well situated appartment, a wellcoming host, definitely a nice place to stay in amsterdam!!
michele is a quiet and warm heated gentleman. his apartment is very clean and tidy. i appreciated the free milk, juice,coffee and bread. it was a great experience in amsterdam. big thanks to michele!

michele was so nice since the first time! when i arrived the weather was terrible, he let me an umbrella and offered breakfast! the flat was really clean, the room so comfortable, and i completely fell in love with the cat!!!
merci à michele pour son accueil.   appartement agréable.   très bon séjour à amsterdam

parfaite expérience à amsterdam !  appartement au pied d un arrêt de tram  (12-13-14) et de bus à 1/4h du centre ville! michèle est discret! cuisine disponible! par contre il ne faut pas craindre son chat qui est adorable !
michele's place was nice and tidy. it was pretty easy to reach it from central station. the position itself is great! really nice place, recommended!
4 giorni fantastici. l'appartamento è molto accogliente e caldo, anche grazie alla presenza della piccola patsy

we havent seen him too much but i can say michele is a good guy, but house is more dirty and older than photos that i see. and actually bed sheets were'nt clean enough, even there were stains a little bit. fragtant room spray used. (we payed 15€ for cleaninf extra, what for?)toilet and kitchen were clean and usefull, thx for breakfest bread,good coffee, milk. and patsy cat was so cute, we loved her. but the hause must be more clean where a cat lives there. first day wifi was not work, after it was fixed, but we couldnt connect from our room good enough, connect quality was very poor. to centrial bus station(18) so close to home, tram station(13) after 5min walk.

le propriétaire est très arrangeant et courtois. il nous a fait confiance.  la chambre est petite mais correcte.  l'emplacement est bien situé pour aller en centre ville à vélo ou par le transport en commun.  je recommande.  hervé
michele was very kind and organized  we had a very nice stay in amsterdam at his place  thanks again  kisses to the nice cat !

it was a great stay. we felt truly welcome. the neighborhood was next to the center. the room and shower were tidy as well. so our expectations very fully met. michele himself was nice and very friendly. but the real show stealer was patsy - that cat was something! we recommend wholeheartedly staying at michele's.
michele made as fill very welcome. the room was very cosy and very good valeu for money.

we had a great stay at michele's place. the room is exactly as described and the beds are comfortable.  michele's place is clean and tastefully decorated, and is very conveniently located near both bus and tram stops.  michele was very friendly and helpful, and provided useful advice on getting around amsterdam. he communicated clearly with us before our arrival, and welcomed us when we did arrive.  the flat is comfortable, and inhabited by michele's very sweet and friendly cat. the facilities are as described, and michele provided us with coffee and a basic breakfast each morning.  we had a very pleasant stay.

we enjoyed our stay at michele's place. the description was accurate and he made arrangements to meet us. the room is small but clean and comfortable, in a good neighborhood, close to public transportation and near a wonderful park. we loved the cat!

cheap and pleasant stay close to the city center, near bus and tram stops. the room and the flat are clean and tidy and beds are comfortable. michele is very nice and helpful. a basic breakfast is included. highly reccomended!
apartamento muito bom, limpo e agradável. comunicação com michelle também foi muito boa. ficamos amigos do seu gato também

espectacular! la verdad que todo excelente, michele nos recibió muy bien y nos brindó todas las comodidades ! el lugar es súper limpio y está muy bien ubicado del centro ! sin duda volvería a hospedarme acá.
michele made us feel very welcome in his flat.   the location was a short 30m walk to the centre or a quick tram in and was perfect for sightseeing.

michele was great, got in contact before. his sister was there to meet us and show us the apartment and make suggestions for the local neighbourhood. good location, bars restaurants and parks nearby. apartment very clean and a very friendly cat!

michele's place was fantastic. the apartment was very nice and comfortable and the neighbourhood was relatively quiet. there is a nice park close by and trams/buses are conventionally right outside the front door which will take you wherever you need to go. we had a soft spot for michele's cat patsy, who is probably the friendliest cat i've ever come across. unfortunately michele was injured and in hospital during our stay, but he did a great job in making sure everything was prepared and helped us with any questions.     cheers    james

michele was a great host. he gave clear directions to his place which was easy to locate. the apartment is a few tram stops away to the city (anne frank house) and major train stations (amsterdam sloterdijk) which is convenient for travelling. his place is clean and i personally love the bathroom - big and clean. the apartment is very clean. i have skin allergies and it didn't give me any problem when i was there (june 2016). i would highly recommend this place if you don't mind climbing 2 flights of stairs.

michele was very welcoming and had a great apartment. it was easy to get around amsterdam from his house. we rented bikes and biked to all of the main sites from his place. there is also a bus right outside his apartment that takes you to the city center. the beds were very comfortable and the room has a large closet. overall, i recommend staying at his apartment.

michele was very kind! greeted us at the door and gave us a tour of his place. he was injured at the time, so we didn't see him much. he allowed us to use his espresso machine, as well as cereal, milk, and orange juice. i felt very comfortable at his place. there is a lock for your door, apartment door, and the main building. there is a tram right outside of his door that takes you to the the main center.
had a wonderful stay with michele! his apartment was perfect for two travelers. i also adored his cat! she was incredibly sweet and a lot of fun.

michele had de pech dat hij net terug was uit het ziekenhuis na een motor ongeluk, maar hij had zijn schoonmaakster ingeschakeld om het huis in orde te maken. michele is een prima gastheer en had ons van tevoren goed ingelicht over het aanreizen etc. het appartement ligt super praktisch bij 2 tramlijnen (12 en 14) en dichtbij supermarkten etc. fijn dat we onze kamer af konden sluiten indien gewenst. volledig tevreden over ons verblijf.

i thoroughly enjoyed staying at michele's place during my trip. all the accommodations in the listing were provided and his place suited my needs perfectly for my stay in amsterdam. michele was also very helpful in helping me find good local shops and restaurants along with helping me find my way around the city. his apartment was close to the downtown area and other major sights in amsterdam.  i would highly recommend michele's apartment to anyone visiting amsterdam.
clean and tidy apartment. michele was nice and his cat is really funny.  the room was a bit tiny for 2 persons plus our luggages and a bit noisy due to the proximity of the street and cars.

michele was very friendly and accomodating.    the house is super well connected to the center and to the station, as well as being really cozy.    i was staying with a friend and the guest room is big enough for a couple people as it is also provided with a small wardrobe.    we had a great time, truly recommended.
linda casa muy cómoda y limpia. excelente desayuno. recomendable.  el anfitrión nos trato muy servicial.

we had a very nice weekend in amsterdam.  the appartment was perfect (near the center, easy access, perfect host).  thank you again for these two days at your place.
bon accueil, chambre condortable. logement à proximité du centre (20 minutes à pieds). a recommander good welcome, comfortable room. apartment near the city center. to recommend.

the listing was as described and in a quiet comfortable neighbourhood. trams were at your door and an easy ride into the centre for all you exploring and shopping needs. michele was a great host, we had tea, coffee, juice and cereal available to us and his cat is very adorable! we enjoyed our stay here and would recommend.

michele's place was lovely. the tram stop is right outside the door and has excellent connections to everywhere in the city. the apartment is very clean and comfortable. patsy the cat is super friendly and loved attention. thank you for hosting us for our first airbnb experience michele!
the room is fantastic as the photos show, very near from the tram station that leaves you in the centre. michele was a great host. the experience was great!

this place is fantastic for a good immersion in the city and its life.  room is like describe on the website page.  thanks to michele for is welcome and kindness.  pasty (his cat) is lovely !     there is convenient transport network direct in front of the apartment, all day and night. very useful for quick and short travels in central town     i highly recommend this place.. thanks for all

todo tal cual la descripcion. a pocos minutos de la zona centrica con el bus y el tram. todas la comodidades, zona residencial con supermercado cerca. latinos tengan en cuenta que en amsterdam la gente cena  a las 6. a pesar de estar indicado el uso de la cocina hasta las 9, nosotras, que cenamos recien a esa hora la utilizamos un poco mas tarde y no hubo problemas. tambien sepan que la gente es estrictamente correcta. no esperen trato afectuoso.
very good value. fantastic location- only 35mins walk to centre. the room is comfortable and clean.
good location, close to the center, cute cat

michels sted var mye som på bildene.hyggelig og rent. han har vaskehjelp. han har også en flott, sosial katt. så du bør like katter. bratt trapp til bolig - så du bør være funksjonsfrisk. nydelig kaffe på morgen - tilgang på printer. rent kjøleskap som du kan sette mat i. det var hyggelig oppredd med håndklær på sengen. michel var høflig, tilbaketrukket og hjelpsom. skrev ut forskjellige buss/ togforbindelser i forbindelser med turer. framstod veldig ansvarlig og ordentlig. mye trafikk i veikrysset nedenfor vinduet. anbefaler " sov i ro " til ørene. relativ kort avstand til kanalene og fantastiske jordan området. morsomt å leie sykler. flott måte å komme seg rundt på. amsterdam var en blanding av veneszia og new york - men også noe helt eget.
è andato tutto bene, l' host è stato molto disponibile e gentile e ci siamo trovati bene.

my friend and i didn't meet michele in person but she was very responsive, friendly and provide all information we needed. we felt at home really. and even cuddle her cat patsy. the lowlight was that my friend got back from the marathon in an unexpected warm day and opened the window - i was still out - and apparently broke the handle or, it was defected previously. i can't assure it. but the main point was that michele was patient and provided feedback immediately with the outcome of the repair. i will always be grateful.
this is a great apt that is conveniently located near public transit lines. the cat is a lovely touch and can't get enough attention. i highly recommend trying razmataz nearby.
michele's apartment was clean and our host arrived perfectly on time. we enjoyed are stay. we also enjoyed the company of patsy the cat.

we were welcome to use kitchen and dining room. michele was friendly and relaxed and made us welcome but left us in peace. patsy the cat very sweet and funny. room is basic but very clean warm and comfortable. location very convenient for transport and felt safe. right on main road but not too noisy. nice.

michele is a very nice and helpful host. we were contacted a few days before arrival and checkin went very smoothly. he recommended the places to go and which trams to use around his area. the entire place is clean and tidy, nice beds and bathroom. the cat is a lovely welcome as well. will definitely recommend for people visiting amsterdam

michele a été très accueillant ainsi que son chat, n'hésitez pas à lui demander conseil! un arrêt de tram et de bus se trouve juste en dessous de l'appartement, donc très pratique pour parcourir amsterdam. il est même possible de rejoindre le centre ville à pied.  je conseille vivement ce logement !

michele was really friendly and welcoming. the apartment and the room were very clean and comfortable. while the place is not in the center it is right next to two tram lines. my only minor complain was that even if the internet was working very well, the wi-fi signal in the room was weak. overall, i would clearly recommend michele's place to anyone visiting amsterdam! :-)

alloggio comodo, pulito e spazioso.  servito con comodità dai mezzi pubblici.  io e la mia fidanzata ci siamo trovato molto bene.  michele è un ottima persona, è molto disponibile!   la presenza della gattina pazzy, rallegra ancora di più la casa!   b&b consigliatissimo!

michele es una persona prudente y respetuosa. nos informó de todo lo que le solicitamos y nos ofreció café y te gratis para el desayuno, lo cual se agradeció. la casa es tranquila, cálida y bien situada. respondió totalmente al anuncio publicado.

we had a great time at michele's. the flat is lovely, very clean and this is a quiet location so you will have a good night sleep. we were only 15min from the city centre by foot, which was great! there are a few nice places around for restaurants and breakfast places. michele was accommodating and patient as we arrived a bit late. and he was very discrete the rest of our stay. we would definitely go back when in amsterdam.

michele è stato molto gentile, ci ha forniro indicazioni utili per orientarci in città e ci ha messo a disposizione gli spazi comuni, proprio come indicato nell'annuncio. l'uso del microonde e del frigo è stato molto comodo per prepararci alcuni pasti, anche in considerazione dei prezzi elevati della città. ottimo livello di pulizia e posizione comoda, consigliato!
a good value place to stay it's a little bit out but served well by trams and buses so all in all a good choice for the price you pay.
